welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Thorne, a charming town in the United Kingdom known for its rich history and scenic landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Thorne has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Humaita Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Humaita Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Humberside International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Humberside International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
